column2: Ontario Ministry of Transportation Install a traffic light at the intersection of Highway 138 and Headline Rd.
column5: Petition for Traffic Lights at Highway 138 and Headline Rd.
column8: We petition the Ministry of Transportation to install a four-way traffic light at the intersection of Headline Road and Highway 138.  This intersection is dangerous and there is a high crash frequency along the 138 including fatalities.  This intersection is frequently used by regular commuters,1163,//d22r54gnmuhwmk.cloudfront.net/photos/8/lq/gm/yWlQGmufWSqMSWK-556x313-cropped.jpg"
